abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column laments passing of humanist worldview that views beauty as important means of transforming the mundane, achieving spiritual evolution and elevating society; contends proper goal of arts lies along these lines; holds shift to post-humanist view that presents world as impersonal and quantifiable has left it beauty-poor and meaning-deprived.
snippet: Modern art has certain kinds of social value, but we have suffered the loss of an old understanding of how beauty transforms the soul.
lead_paragraph: Modern art has certain kinds of social value, but we have suffered the loss of an old understanding of how beauty transforms the soul.
